title: Horror Game Puzzle Pack #1
description: Slide tablets to complete pictures. Customize materials, size, and pieces. Turn switches green, unlimited with customizable lights. Rotate statues, customize rotation and quantity. Order paintings infinitely. Inspired by classic horror games.
longDescription:
[Trailer/Showcase] [Tutorials] [DEMO] [Documentation] [Discord]

🎮 Horror-Themed Blueprint Puzzles Ready to Go 🧩

Welcome to a new series of Horror themed content I will start uploading. My Horror Puzzle Pack is here to save you time and effort while adding awesome puzzles to your game.

📜 What's Included?


🔮 Sliding Tablet Puzzle: Solve the puzzle by sliding the tablets to the correct space to make the complete picture. You can edit the material, size, and how many pieces are in the puzzle. It comes with a pedestal that you can interact with to zoom in and apply the appropriate rules to start sliding the puzzle pieces.


💡 Light Switch Puzzle: Click the switches to make all them green. Trick is you may also turn some switches off. Which lights turn on and off are completely up to you. They can be added anywhere, and can have an infinite amount of total switches.


🌀 Rotating Statue Puzzle: Rotate the statues to face the correct one. Once you have it solved, press the button. You can edit what rotates, how much they rotate, and add as many statues as you want. A plaque that you can inspect is also including to give you a clue on how to solve it.


🎨 Painting Order Puzzle: Inspired by my favorite puzzle from one of my all time favorite horror games, you must press the paintings buttons in the correct order. Select wrong, the puzzle resets. You can edit the paintings materials, add an infinite number of them, and easily choose which ones are correct or incorrect.


  • 🧠 Easy Integration: No need to stress about puzzle mechanics. My pack comes with straightforward blueprints that fit right into your project.
  • 🌌 Models/materials included: Each puzzle logic comes with a touch of custom models and materials, setting the spooky mood just right.
  • ⏳ Save Time: Skip the complex puzzle scripting. My pack saves you valuable development hours.
  • 📚 Documentation: Whether you're a pro or a newbie, my clear documentation guides you through the process.


All content other than the DEMO and Starter Content was created by me.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  4 detailed puzzles that are easy to use
  •  A clue plaque that the player can read
  •  An interact dot feature
  • Little to none setup
  • Custom models and materials
  • Fully documented with link and in engine notes
  • Custom font!!!

Number of Blueprints: 13

Input: Keyboard and Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1voJECZGyA2_mJk9uTScPZiuvmzrrsnuJVWRxHvxj44U/edit?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes: All content other than the DEMO and Starter Content was made and created by me. I have all rights to all content I have included.
